net.asrex.skillful.ui

Class PerkUIRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.asrex.skillful.ui.PerkUIRegistry

  • public class PerkUIRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    A central registry for all PerkUIDefinition classes and associated configuration data. Other mods may register their own UI implementations here using

    Note that

      • registerUi

        public static void registerUi(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.Class<? extends PerkUIDefinition> clazz)
        Registers a perk UI implementation with the given name. Names should be all lower-case and consist only of letters a-z and underscores ('_').

        Third-party UI classes should be registered at startup during the FMLInitializationEvent. Skill configuration will be read from disk during the FMLPostInitializationEvent, and any missing definitions at this time will result in an error.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the UI to register
        clazz - the class of the implementation to add
